notes.text:
Triple storm shreds everything. I was really struggling with just 2 but Anthoknee was like "dawg play 3 storms". Super mind blown by the results. Unless the situation is dire like if you need a specific card, it is never a dead card. There were so many situations where I needed econ mostly for an econ take play so I definitely won't be dropping mine any time soon. 

This is also more T1 REZ propaganda.
